entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tests failing with BadImageFormatException #74396
  • Saving an AdditionalFiles document in Balanced mode fails to trigger source generator #74395
  • Check if ModuleCancellationInstrumenter gracefully handles ref kind differences between original and replacement methods #74393
  • Source Generator generated code cannot be compiled #74388

Closed

  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString does not use fully qualified names for default enum parameter values #56573
    Backlog
  • A misleading warning is reported for an inline array type with ref like type parameter as an element type #73556
    17.11
  • Test plan for "`Lock` object" feature #71888
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix infra issues #74397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid BuildHost crash in Mono due to missing types #74392
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #74390
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fill some gaps in Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #74389
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Improve span conversion tests #74387
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Merged

  • Allow services to use System.Text.Json for OOP comms in Razor #74280
    Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74394
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove double array allocation in SemanticTokens #74271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update asserts to improve diagnosability of dartlab test failure #74391
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74371
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review
  • Convert HideAdvancedMembers option to editorconfig option #74360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid reporting redundant and possibly misleading WRN_InlineArrayNotSupportedByLanguage #74283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Handle span conversions in expression trees #74349
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Test Lock with .NET 9 runtime #74367
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type, Next

Updated

  • Convert ImplementTypeOptions to editorconfig options #74376
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK #74329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix UnscopedRef handling in indexers #74343
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to STJ for client side LSP serialization #74364
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Extensions: Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field (#73407)" #74346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • SpillSequenceSpiller – preserve `ref` BoundConditionalOperator in presence of spilling in its either branch #74310
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Fix interceptors bugs involving ref this parameters #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Additional tests for `ref struct interfaces` feature #74282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Tests to verify ref safety bug fix #74341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defender Investigation #74374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve performance of SourceText.LineInfo indexer. #74267
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable running in ARM64-native mode on .NET Framework. #74285
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
